title: Judge: Trump must give Venezuelan migrants notice before deportations
shortDescription: The ruling comes amidst a contentious legal battle unfolding over the Alien Enemies Act.

title: Can Donald Trump sack Fed chief Jerome Powell?
shortDescription: Donald Trump wants rid of Jerome Powell. He says his termination cannot come soon enough.

title: Trump to speak to graduates of University of Alabama, West Point
shortDescription: Trump's first speeches to graduates in his second term will be at the University of Alabama and the U.S. Military Academy in West Point, NY.

title: Democratic US Rep. Haley Stevens jumps into Michigan US Senate race
shortDescription: Stevens' congressional experience, pro-manufacturing ties and fundraising acumen could give her a leg up in the Democratic nomination race.

title: A church saw an opportunity to plant trees. Trump team saw DEI effort
shortDescription: A Trump administration review stalled funds from a Biden-era effort to plant trees across American cities in neighborhoods that lack tree cover.

title: Environmental lawyers preparing for showdown over Trump energy deregulation
shortDescription: Environmental groups say they are preparing for a major legal showdown over sweeping efforts to sidestep federal regulations on oil, gas and coal development.

title: ADL called Trump's antisemitism claims on Harvard an 'overreach'
shortDescription: ADL President Jonathan Greenblatt is concerned "about the extent and scope of the current approach taken by the Administration to Harvard."

title: Congressman cites USA TODAY report demanding answers on gay stylist
shortDescription: U.S. Rep. Robert Garcia wants answers from CoreCivic and ICE regarding the deportation of a 31-year-old gay Venezuelan asylum seeker.

title: Trump approval rating dips, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's public approval rating edged down to its lowest level since his return to the White House, a Reuters/Ipsos poll found.

title: Trump administration threatens to pull funding from Harvard: Read text
shortDescription:
"Harvard has in recent years failed to live up to both the intellectual and civil rights conditions that
justify federal investment," the letter reads.

title: President Trump orders flags at half-staff to honor Pope Francis
shortDescription: Following the news of Pope Francisâ€™ death, President Donald Trump addressed the annual White House Easter Egg Roll and honored the late pontiff.

title: Harvard sues Trump administration over attacks on school funding
shortDescription: Harvard University sued the Trump administration, alleging it unlawfully threatened the school's academic independence and research.

title: President Trump and Melania to attend Pope Francis funeral
shortDescription: The pope's death came one day after Francis greeted thousands in St. Peter's Square after Easter Mass in his open-air popemobile.

title: Trump, Hegseth on second Signal chat leak
shortDescription: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth lashed out against reports that he was involved in a second Signal chat leak.

title: Are free cancer tests and cholesterol meds constitutional? Supreme Court mulling
shortDescription: The Affordable Care Act required insurers to cover preventive care at no cost to patients. Some Christian businesses in Texas are challenging that.
